name: Table
icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 50 20'><g><path fill='#868695' d='M36,15v2h11v-2H36z M40,10v2h7v-2H40z M11,10v2h14v-2H11z M3,10v2h3v-2H3z M11,15v2h17v-2H11z M3,15v2h3 v-2H3z'/><path fill='#424251' d='M1,19V1h48v18H1z M0,0v20h50V0H0z'/><path fill='#A7A8B7' d='M1,7v1h7v11h1V8h22v11h1V8h17V7H32V1h-1v6H9V1H8v6H1z'/><path fill='none' stroke='#424251' d='M35,3h12v2H35V3z M11,3h13v2H11V3z M3,3h3v2H3V3z'/></g></svg>

properties.label: Headers
properties.caption: Comma separated
properties.help: List of table column headings, separated by commas. Headings are displayed at the top of the table.
properties.name: headers

properties.label: Available values
properties.help: Collection used to populate the table. Could be a simple list or a list of objects
properties.name: availableValues

properties.label: Columns key
properties.caption: Empty in case of simple list
properties.help: When 'Available values' is a list of objects, specifies the attributes to display in the table columns. Column identifiers are separated by commas
properties.name: columnsKey
